channel.title: IP Connecting Problem

item.title: IP Connecting Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

There might be a few problems something is interfering with your port’s, or you didnt portfoward right even though the port might be open you probably didnt portforward right.

Search for Server = in your client.java and there should be 2 spots to put your ip into

if this didnt help then im sorry

Read full topic

item.title: IP Connecting Problem
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

I have a problem connecting my client to the source. The client already works with 127.0.0.1, but when I change it to my IP or my no-ip it DOESN’T work. I have port forwarded and everything is fine. Canyouseeme.org tells me 43594 is online on my ip & another website told me my no-ip is fine.

There is no gui or egui or something on my client. The only way to change the ip in my client is by client.java and this is what is shows.

if(signlink.mainapp != null) return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase(); try { if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http://127.0.0.1:" + (43594 + anInt958)); } catch(Exception _ex) { } return super.getCodeBase();

I change the 127.0.0.1 to my ip and no-ip and it doesn’t log me in, not even a character log in log in my cmd from my run server that shows someone is trying to log in.

Read full topic
